data.message:
I'm hurting, I'm hurting but it's good, I'm learning, I understand, I'm immune
I have never taken so many blows as lately, on all sides
I have to explain myself, defend myself, justify myself, calm myself, manage, face
To believe without seeing, to trust, alone against all, the intentions of attention
Visualize, a closed cage, several locks, you hear him scolding
As a notch and yet another, who but who will be the one,
Who will open the last, worse one who will open the door?
My sweetness, its many fractures, my ardor goes back from the depths
My rage, my language my response to outrages sometimes at the limit of carnage
But imagine, if I lose control, that one shot is too much, and what I do with words.
I was my worst enemy, I am now the one I fear most !!!
